She looks around and hurries down an intersecting passageway. She's gone only a few steps, when just ahead of her, thick vines shoot out and form a dense barrier. She takes a breath and dives into the surging growth. She almost makes it through, but at the last moment, vines wrap her arms and legs, holding her prisoner. She gives up, with a sigh. The celebrants shield their eyes, but Cassiopeia can't. She crumples, aging before our eyes. Every word shakes her frame -- TIAMAT Look upon the sublime and know your error. You'll not blink. Tell me now, mortal, how bright your preening urchin shines? No one dare look long at the Goddess. No one but Perseus. Tiamat notices Perseus... and his boldness.

dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: It won't do Boreas any good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do not believe my fate is to be half a God. No demigod could feel as confused as I do tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Concentrate on the task before you. All answers will come with that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A fierce group. Trained to fight... Amoun's DESCRIPTION CONTINUES as we -- CUT TO: EXT. SIROQUE VALLEY - NIGHT SUPERIMPOSE: CLEON DESERT LEGION BIVOUAC, THE DISPUTED TERRITORIES The desert camp of the Legion is lit by torches. The
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: You can honor Boreas by the way you act from this moment forward.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm no demigod, Tutor. I'm not even much of a human.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It is not your choice. You are what you are. Amor fati, Perseus. 'Love thy fate.'
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Tell me of the Cleon Desert Legion.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: are handsome, powerful career warriors, going about their evening business -- eating, cleaning weapons, washing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) . behind enemy lines.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: peers into the dark desert, listening. Now he HEARS something, turns and shouts to another SENTRY:
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Night Patrol returns on the Gorge Road! That message is shouted along from Sentries to Guards in the camp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: on the dusty Gorge Road, a dozen Soldiers gallop in GROUND-SHAKING FORMATION toward the firelit encampment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . They've been chasing Djinn Raiders in the mountains for years.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) Djinn Raiders?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, Godly zealots, supposedly insane. They fight like Hades himself is keeping score... From the dark SURROUNDING DESERT, WE SEE the Night Patrol ride into camp and dismount.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .. That's how the Desert Legion came to be called 'God-slayers.' I'm not ashamed to say I'll be relieved to have their protection the rest of the way... Amoun's Voice FADES. TILT DOWN TO the barren, desert flats. Suddenly, a miracle transforms the moonlit
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Strange, beautiful MAGENTA FLOWERS sprout magically where there had been only dirt and cacti. The LOTUS BLOSSOMS surround the camp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Cleon camp is just twinkling lights from here on the mountain. Startlingly, a huge DEFORMED PAW/CLAW/HOOF scrapes onto a boulder. Pulling himself INTO VIEW in repulsive CLOSEUP -- Kalibos. (There, within his frightening visage, is the distinctive crooked scar we noticed on the jaw of Acrisius in his human form.) When his twisted body has gained purchase, he looks up the mountain. AN EERIE LIGHT illuminates his awestruck countenance. Above him -- (CONTINUED) 63.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tiamat, ensconced in a natural throne of rock. Turning a Lotus blossom in her hand, she smiles on Kalibos, like a benevolent mother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My loyal friend. it is beneath you to stalk this band of infidels one by one. Events demand more decisive action. Kalibos' SPEECH is as tortured and deformed as his body -- KALIBOS Grorashnrd... I to be... ruler... rhodirs... made whole... sovfrenty... kingdom mine...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, Kalibos, the time is nigh when I restore you to your rightful form -- proud Acrisius. With me, your protector, on the throne of Olympos... the violator Zeus deposed. Kalibos reacts, with what must be satisfaction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Several Soldiers have been drawn from camp by the
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Go down into this valley. See what I am building for you -- an army dangerous and fearless as you, their leader.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: of the Lotus flowers. They pluck petals and chew them. The rest of the Legion filters out between the tents to take their fill of the drug. Kalibos watches the handsome, powerful warriors from across the field of Lotus blossoms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Peshet comes into the dark room and looks at the lump on Andromeda's bed. On instinct, she hurries to the bed and throws off the covers -- a pile of cushions, no Andromeda. Peshet races out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Peshet sprints through the RAIN, dodging the REFUGEES and CITIZENS like a cat, peering under each hood, searching for her mistress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On the plaza, a rabid throng of Refugees. Fantasos, the Revolutionary leader, exhorts the mob, surrounded by
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: including Agenor. As before, Fantasos seems to have actual hypnotic powers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How much are we meant to suffer? Where is your mighty King? Safely cloistered above the flood... on the high ground, with the high- born -- the privileged gentry!... The angry crowd responds, fists shaking. Peshet moves through the throng, desperately looking for Andromeda. She passes close to the rostrum and Fantasos registers her presence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Does Kepheus worry about you? No! Only the Princessa... And still, the Kraken comes! Does the King build his defenses at the water's edge?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !" cries the crowd. Peshet is shocked to find herself replying with them -- "NO1" Fantasos motions for Agenor to continue the harangue, while Fantasos hurries off the stage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! He makes his stand at his daughter's chamber door!... We will show Kepheus we're not sacrificial fodder. We will tremble the walls of his Basilica!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from the mob. Peshet stops suddenly, peering ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from the anonymity of a hooded cloak, terrified. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: at the fringe of the crowd, Andromeda herself watches
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Andromeda is the one Tiamat wants! We die so she may live... As the crowd EXPLODES, Andromeda hurries away in tears. Peshet fights through the crush to follow her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .- NIGHT Peshet rounds a corner, frustrated. Andromeda is gone. A hand grabs Peshet's shoulder, startling her. It is Fantasos.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One night soon, a gong will sound three times. When you hear it, unlock the back gate of the Basilica. Then go to Andromeda's chambers... (hands her a dagger) . and bring the Princess out. My men will take her to Leviathan. Peshet just stares at the dagger, hands trembling.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Peshet, you've come at the right time. Fantasos engages her with hypnotic power. Peshet nods, trance-like.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Do you understand me? (harshly, off her non-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Peshet, do you understand how important your part is? She nods, horrified by her predicament.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : THE SIROQUE MOUNTAINS, THE DISPUTED TERRITORIES...   19 DAYS REMAINING The Expedition moves through a mountain pass. Perseus eyes a cliff. Amoun and Draco stop. Glimpses of CLOAKED FIGURES in the boulders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You wanted to know about Djinn Raiders. Here they are. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the others) Look sharp. Watch your surround.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vidalia warily eyes the carpet of magenta flowers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Alkali Lotus... She stops, spotting something in the distance. Kosmo pulls up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: shimmering through the desert heat -- tents and flags.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An army bivouac... flying the flag of Joppa. Its the Cleon Legion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Expedition enters the abandoned camp. They look around in dismay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is everyone? Spyros HEARS something and follows the SOUND to a tent, weapon ready.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Spyros looks inside. A cauldron BUBBLES over a fresh fire. ALKALI LOTUS blossoms bob on the boiling broth. Spyros, uneasy, backs out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: r L Spyros comes out. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Draco, tell me what this -- Everyone is standing perfectly still.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: creatures: LOTOPHAGI.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: surround them. The transformed Cleon Legion lurches INTO VIEW. The only resemblance to the soldiers they were is their armor.. Now they're monstrous
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: as it plants in the dust. The companion foot lands beside it -- completely different. TILT UP TO: Kalibos. Perseus stands by Vidalia, watching the monsters. Kalibos immediately focuses on the demigod. He sniffs the air around Perseus.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lotophagi. Lotus-eaters. We should leave... now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mongke and Tamburlane BLAST the swarm with HANDGONNES. Spyros lobotomizes one with his harpoon. Amoun opens a leather sack of sand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Muster to me! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I won't do anything rash. I've learned my lesson.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This time you must do something rash. We all must. Kalibos leans close to Perseus.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Tosharicana... demigod... expulsotat... Zeusl
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No... Perseus.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: . The whole Expedition comes to life as
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: swift and brutal. Long arms thrash and rip at the Praetorians.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Thad, Krikor and Perseus are the first there. Amoun tosses an arc of the black sand around them all. The ring of sand transforms into a dense, swirling swarm of insects. Amoun shouts to the others, still fighting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on! You can pass through! Draco bolts for the barrier. A Lotophagi spears Kosmo, killing him. Draco slides inside the swarm. He looks back at Kosmo in horror. Polluc slashes zombies and runs toward the swarm. He's almost there when one of the Lotophagi lands on him, sinking fangs into his skull. Polluc sticks his sword into the creature; they both fall over dead. Icos and Spyros fight their way to the swarm and jump inside. Mongke and Tamburlane kill a Lotus-eater and leap over the corpse into the protected circle. The tide of HOWLING and SHRIEKING Lotophagi claw at the barrier of insects to no avail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only humans can penetrate the shield! Perseus takes quick stock of the group inside the swarm, thinking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only humans... He looks over the Lotophagi and sees Vidalia out there, alone, flinging sling-bullets as she fights her way toward the barrier.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drop the barrier!                                          r
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! It's too late for her!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drop it, Amoun! At that moment, Kalibos grabs Vidalia and drags her to the top of an outcrop. At the top, he turns, LOOKS DIRECTLY AT PERSEUS and HOWLS, his message clear: "If you want to save her, come and get her." He hungrily rips her leather bandeau. Perseus turns to Amoun. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take the barrier down or I'll go through it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you learned nothing? If you break out now, we're all at risk. On the boulder, Kalibos grabs Vidalia's white flesh. Perseus is anguished; he knows he's in love.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've learned one thing for certain! Perseus shouts at Thad, the massive Praetorian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get down! Perseus backs away three steps. To the others
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get ready to defend yourselves! Perseus runs, plants a foot on Thad's back and leaps out through the swarm, which immediately dissipates around the humans. They have only a moment to react as the stunned Lotophagi come to their senses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's kill these freks! Perseus runs over the backs of the Lotophagi. Hurtling off them, he scrambles up and knocks Kalibos off Vidalia. Ralibos rolls, flips onto his feet and gives Perseus a look: "You're the one that I want." They face off, looking for an opening. Perseus lunges, thrusting his sword. Kalibos dodges, springing up the rocks and then down toward Perseus, acrobatic as an ape. Perseus rolls out of the way. Perseus sweeps his sword at Kalibos' head. The monster catches the blade in his jaws and SNAPS IT IN TWO! Bloody spittle flies from his tongue. Kalibos pounces, pins Perseus. He opens his jaw and sinks his teeth into Perseus' shoulder. Vidalia cracks a rock into Kalibos' head. The creature whirls on Vidalia and careens toward her, head bloody. Perseus leaps in the air and catches Kalibos in the back with both feet, knocking him over the edge. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kalibos slams down on the jagged boulders and ricochets off, pinwheeling through the air. The grotesque figure hits the lower rocks head-first and his neck CRUNCHES. He slams into the dust, dead. Perseus lands on his back, weak from the bite. When he tries to rise, his legs are rubbery. Vidalia catches him as he falls forward and lowers him gently, looking at the bloody puncture wounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay... sshh... I've got you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: in the distance. Vidalia scans the horizon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Draco, Spyros, Amoun and the others hack away, fending off the Lotophagi. Outnumbered, they won't last long. The earth VIBRATES. The Lotophagi are distracted, looking around nervously. Over a rise stampede SCORPIOCHS, rhino-sized scorpions. Riding them, DJINN RAIDERS, flowing black silk masking all but their blue eyes. They lay into the Lotophagi. The Scorpiochs skewer the beasts with HUGE PINCERS. The Djinn use flashing
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to cut them down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: in Vidalia's arms, the fading Perseus watches as the Djinn turn and surround the Expedition members, closing in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vidalia... we need to help them... He blacks out. Vidalia cranes to look over the edge of the cliff where Kalibos fell. She is mystified by what SHE SEES: The deformed monster Kalibos is gone. In his place, neck broken, lies a handsome, aging noble, finally at peace -- King Acrisius.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: each a lantern hanging from a Scorpioch's tail. The Expedition members ride on the Scorpioch with the Djinn. Some of the huge scorpions carry small box/rooms (palanquins) on their backs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perseus lies sprawled on cushions, unconscious. Vidalia replaces the dressing on his bite wound. Knowing he cannot hear her -- VIDALIA To save me, you risked everything
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: your mission, your friends... the fate of multitudes. Men need better judgment in the one who is meant to lead them... No longer able to lecture, she regards him with love. TENDERLY -- VIDALIA You shouldn't have risked your life for me. It is a waste to save me when I'll be gone so soon. She strokes his hair and kisses his forehead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you for your reckless disregard. Thank you, Perseus... Vidalia holds her palm above the floor and mutters a quick incantation. A small shoot APPEARS and SPROUTS FAT PODS. Vidalia squeezes the salve from a pod and covers Perseus' wound. The wound bulges, then squirms deeper into Perseus. Perseus shoots up, clutching his chest. Vidalia gently lays him down. Perseus gags. A VIPER WRIGGLES from his throat and slithers away with the fat lump of infection in its stomach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The poison is gone now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where... Where are we? The
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the Djinn caravan. They're escorting us to the Skolothian border.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I thought the Djinn...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . We all did. But their leader, Shaikh Suleiman, has some special interest in you. (off his confusion) Just sleep. She waves her palm over his face, and he does sleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Surviving Lotophagi chew on the bones of the fallen. One reaches hungrily for an Alkali Lotus in the sand, but suddenly the petals blacken and curl. The creature, spooked, sniffs the air. All at once, the Lotophagi age years in seconds and keel over, dead. The cause: Set the Void glides over, surveying the battlefield.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Expedition rides through a war-ravaged village of stucco and thatch. DOORS and SHUTTERS CREAK shut as they pass, UNSEEN INHABITANTS skitter about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Skolothians have suffered more than their share in this war. The Legions of the Gods have battered them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's no wonder they shy away from all strangers. Perseus looks ahead, where the Expedition is parting company with the Djinn Raiders. only one of the Djinn is staying -- SHAIKH SULEIMAN, a veiled priest.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : FRONTIER OF SKOLOTHIA... 15   DAYS REMAINING DRACO
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Why does this Djinn priest stay with us? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because of you. You're the reason they saved us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me? I don't understand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you ask him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought they didn't speak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They have no mouths. That doesn't mean they do not speak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Expedition climbs through rugged country. At a turn, Amoun looks up. Dead ahead, wreathed in fog -- sheer granite pinnacles, one towering above the others.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Pillar of Moirai. Lair of the Norn Sisters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're witches in the form of Strix. Not a pleasant sight, a Strix. They have powerful magic and dreadful habits. Baby-eaters, among other things. (off Perseus' shock) But they owe me a favor. When the war broke out, they lent their power to men against the Gods in exchange for infant sacrifice. Tiamat struck them blind for their treachery. When they came for help, I fashioned them an artificial eye, for their Second Sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You made only one eye? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pleased with his
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. They have to take turns. If they all could see at once, they would be invincible, which one cannot risk in beings so grotesque.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Expedition sleeps in a drizzle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Shaikh Suleiman moves toward Perseus. The
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: comes from behind his veil. He pulls a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from his cloak. The priest, blade poised, stands over the sleeping Perseus.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: runs Spyros, his harpoon raised for a strike.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay away from my boy! Without touching him, the Shaikh throws the fisherman over his head, where he lands hard with an "UMPH!" Perseus jolts awake. He reaches for his sword, but has none. Spyros struggles to his feet to start another charge. Suleiman raises his hand and freezes Spyros in his position. The Shaikh's veil has fallen, revealing his frightening countenance: scaled skin of charred wood; eyes like slots in a furnace. Perseus listens to the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Spyros, he means me no harm. The Shaikh lowers his hand: Spyros falls into the dirt. The Shaikh pulls his veil over his face. He kneels before Perseus, head bowed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hear you and I understand you. But I don't know how.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Moi ne epos ae'prositi, mene daeva. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are praying to me? There must be a mistake. The Shaikh proffers the gleaming bronze sickle which has a zig-zag, LIGHTNING BOLT PATTERN engraved on the blade, honoring Zeus.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An offering'? I thank you and take it humbly, as agift from a friend, not an offering. He takes the weapon and bows his head, surprising the Shaikh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tuj patir esti ho theos kosmosr.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You honor my father? You honor Spyros?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ho Zeus Patir... Zeus... Perseus reacts, taken aback to hear it from this mysterious stranger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Expedition ascends the sheer pinnacle via rain-slick stairs and GROANING ROPE BRIDGES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In a morning fog, the Expedition enters a circle of FREE- STANDING MONOLITHS white with bird crap. All around: regurgitated food, shredded garments and tiny human baby bones.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: of WINGS and suddenly perched atop the stones are the NORN SISTERS: URD, VERDANDI, and SKULD -- human- sized owls with the gray faces of old crones                (Strix). Each has one central EYE SOCKET; they share one
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Strix toss the Eye between them and pop it in to study the arrivals.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (low, hoot-owl) Amoun... So sorry to see you again. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Likewise, Urd. I seek your counsel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want us to tell you about Leviathan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know already... of course.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We know this -- the Kraken cannot be defeated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: it was not a taxing one. The Sisters CACKLE HORRIBLY. Skuld SWOOSHES down. Icos and Krikor, terrified, hit the deck. Skuld tosses the Eye back to Urd. Perseus watches with growing irritation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Surely the beast from the sea has some weakness. You owe me this answer at least.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Sisters owe nothing to you or any Man! She tosses the Eye to Verdandi, who focuses her attention on Perseus.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's something wrong with that one. I don't like having him here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me take a look. Verdandi tosses the Eye to Skuld. Perseus leaps and snags the Eye out of mid-air. The Strix SCREECH. Perseus goes to the precipice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell us what we want to know or your Eye has seen its last. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: You've wasted a journey. I trust
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Norns flap their wings and puff up their feathers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've brought a thief into our nest!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A villain!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Scum!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, good Sisters... the son of Zeus. The Strix react in horror and all land on the same monolith.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Since you cannot see, let me tell you what's about to happen. I'm about to throw this evil Eye to the rocks far below. I fear its journey will be a taxing one. The members of the Expedition are impressed; Vidalia, too: the young demigod shows growing leadership. The Strix are panicked -- URD We can't tell you. We don't dare betray Tiamat again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She sees all! Her touch is felt in every evil thing!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A second offense and she will
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't have to tell us the secret. But you will have to live as blind as she made you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Give us the Eye and we'll tell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me first. If I like the answer, you get your Eye. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We need the Eye to see the answer!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know the answer sure as you already knew the question. The Norn Sisters confer, enclosed in a curtain of wings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leviathan can be destroyed...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The beast has one weakness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell us now! The Strix are torn, frightened. Finally -- URD The stare of Medusa. No creature can look directly in her eyes and still survive. The answer hangs in the silence of the stunned Expedition.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're lying, Perseus. Perseus studies the Sisters, weighing his response.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I believe them. (tosses the Eye high) Here's your second sight. Verdandi launches and catches it in her beak, pops it in her socket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the Norns) And Medusa! Where does she abide?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In Tartaros, beyond the frozen Tethys Sea. Only Charon's ferry dare challenge the ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How can she be slain? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With extraordinary cunning and unimaginable luck. Skuld flaps to the pitch-black portal to an UNDERGROUND VAULT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And the proper tools. Explore our cache of spoils. You may find such a tool. Perseus stares into the black entrance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't go in there, Perseus. It's a trap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. We have guaranteed the rage of Tiamat with this revelation...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . we ask only that the young God mention our aid...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... to his Father.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If ever I should meet him. (turns toward the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need a light. The Shaikh holds a branch near his eyes until the end bursts into flame and hands it to Perseus, who disappears into the blackness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perseus fights through cobwebs and hanging roots. The torch REVEALS piles of armor, bones, and broken weapons. A round edge catches his eye. He pulls it free -- A SHIELD, TARNISHED AND DENTED. Unsure why it attracted him, he shoulders it and leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Joppa is under siege! King Kepheus needs these supplies! Something huge breaches the surface. The captain squints through the rain... and sees the GIGANTIC SCUTED TAIL of Leviathan. IT GOES RIGHT PAST THEM, miraculously leaving the fleet untouched. But then -- they HEAR a sound BIGGER than the typhoon. The dark sky gets darker as an ENORMOUS BLACK SHAPE appears behind the Fleet, bearing down on them at impossible speed -- TIAMAT'S PALACE-GALLEON so dwarfs the Fleet that it PLOWS THROUGH the other ships without noticing, obliterating them in seconds, sending all hands to the depths.

FROM THE TOP OF FRAME, Medusa's fingers reach for his blindfold. She pulls the knot and the blindfold falls. Eyes closed, Perseus slashes the air, sweeping the sickle about until it SMASHES into the column -- BRINNNGI The SOUND ECHOES, then FADES. Perseus waits and listens. Then, PING!, one drop of Medusa's blood lands on his shield. Perseus opens his eyes and peers into his shield. In the reflection on the bronze, he SEES: Movement. Snakes. Searing eyes... Medusa! Eyes shut, he windmills his weapon above him. Medusa's talons DEFLECT the blade and the sickle flies from his grip. Perseus scrambles for it on his hands and knees. Behind him, Medusa SLITHERS down the column and heads for Perseus. Perseus reaches the sickle. He lifts his shield up in front of him and sees Medusa's reflection growing closer behind him. He shuts his eyes and wheels around, blade sweeping. A soft F-THMMP as the blade slices through something...
